title: Dialectical Leadership-Based Transformative Learning Design in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Strengthening creative problem-solving competencies in contradictory situations within digital collaborative environments

learning_goals: Apply core principles of dialectical leadership (integrative thinking, acceptance of duality) to scientific problem-solving.
In PBL environments, recognize ethical dilemmas and scientific contradictions, then propose resolution strategies.
Reflectively evaluate learning outcomes based on peer feedback and establish improvement strategies.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
